Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IId bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Enterococcus faecalis JCM 5803 (MIC=86.9 nM), Enterococcus faecalis OU510 (MIC=174 nM), E. faecium TUA 1344L (MIC=43.4 nM), E. hirae ATCC 10541 (MIC=5.44 nM), Lactobacillus plantarum ATCC 14917 (MIC=86.9 nM), L. sakei ssp. sakei JCM 1157 (MIC=5.44 nM), Bacillus coagulans JCM 2257 (MIC=89000 nM), Bacillus subtilis JCM 1465 (MIC=44500 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Atypical genetic locus associated with constitutive production of enterocin B by Enterococcus faecium BFE 900.
Literature.Author: Franz CM, Worobo RW, Quadri LE, Schillinger U, Holzapfel WH, Vederas JC, Stiles ME.
